channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X is moving its legal disputes to Northern Texas
item.description: Lawsuits against X (formerly Twitter) will soon be heard in the US District Court for the Northern District of Texas. The shift was first announced la...

item.title: Editor’s Note: What’s Next for WIRED
item.description: Last week’s US election will affect the future for all of us. Here’s how we’ll cover it.

item.title: It’s the Senate’s last chance to pass the PRESS Act

item.description: There are many kinds of mothers, but these are our favorite picks for the WIRED mom in your life.
